members.status: Sole survivor, now joining Straw Hats

description: A pirate crew that Brook belonged to before their deaths approximately 50 years ago. Brook is the sole survivor, having been resurrected by the Yomi Yomi no Mi after death, though his body had already decomposed to bones.

keyEvents.title: Rumbar Pirates Ship Appears
keyEvents.description: The ghost ship that belonged to the Rumbar Pirates appears through the fog with Brook, the sole survivor, aboard.
keyEvents.significance: First mention/appearance of Brook's former crew, whose tragic story will be revealed later in the arc.

headquarters: Rumbar Pirates Ship (now a ghost ship)
trivia: All members except Brook died approximately 50 years before the main story
Brook's resurrection took so long that his body had decomposed to just bones by the time his soul returned
The crew's full story and tragic fate will be revealed later in the Thriller Bark arc
